title: What is Python? A Beginner's Guide
description: A simple introduction to Python for absolute beginners. We'll cover what Python is, what it's used for, and why it's so popular. No coding experience required!
subject: Python Programming

title: Python Classes and Data Structures
description: Learn about classes, objects, and common data structures in Python like lists, dictionaries, and sets. Includes practical code examples.
subject: Python Programming

title: Advanced Python: Metaclasses
description: Dive deep into advanced Python concepts like metaclasses. Understand how they work under the hood with complex examples.
subject: Python Programming

title: Building a Simple Web Scraper with Python
description: A step-by-step tutorial on how to build a web scraper using Python libraries like Requests and BeautifulSoup.
subject: Python Programming

title: Asyncio in Python: A Deep Dive
description: Master asynchronous programming in Python with asyncio. Learn about event loops, coroutines, and tasks for high-performance I/O-bound applications.
subject: Python Programming

title: Python for Data Science: NumPy and Pandas
description: An introduction to the core data science libraries in Python. Learn how to use NumPy for numerical operations and Pandas for data manipulation.
subject: Data Science

title: Web Development with Django
description: Get started with Django, the high-level Python web framework. Learn about models, views, and templates to build your first web application.
subject: Web Development

title: Testing in Python with pytest
description: Learn how to write effective tests for your Python code using the pytest framework. Covers basics, fixtures, and parameterized testing.
subject: Software Engineering

title: Python Decorators Explained
description: A clear explanation of how decorators work in Python. Understand this powerful feature to write more elegant and reusable code.
subject: Python Programming

title: Working with APIs in Python
description: A practical guide to fetching data from web APIs using Python's requests library. Learn how to handle JSON responses and query parameters.
subject: Python Programming
